name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **PHP**, **Python**, and **JavaScript**, focusing on robust backend development using advanced frameworks. My proficiency extends across **Node.js**,**Django**, and modern microservices architectures. I am skilled at building secure and scalable APIs and have a solid understanding of cloud services, particularly with **Azure** and **AWS**. My hands-on experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD automation ensures seamless deployment pipelines.  
In addition to my technical skill set, I have successfully led agile projects using **Scrum** methodologies, delivering high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. I prioritize cybersecurity and adhere to regulatory compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My commitment to data quality and a structured approach to remote work further enhance my capability to contribute effectively as a Senior Backend Engineer.
